Class Buchkatalog

java.lang.Object
Buchkatalog
public class Buchkatalog extends Object
This class contains the business logic for searching and filtering books as well as accessing reviews (ratings).

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Buchkatalog(StorageService storageService)
    Constructor – loads books from the provided StorageService.

    • Buchkatalog

      public Buchkatalog(StorageService storageService)
      Constructor – loads books from the provided StorageService.
      Parameters:
      storageService - Service for data handling (e.g., JSON files)

  • Method Details

    • buchsuche

      public List<Buch> buchsuche(String query)
      Searches for books by title.
      Parameters:
      query - Search text (case-insensitive)
      Returns:
      List of books whose titles contain the search text

    • sucheNachAutor

      public List<Buch> sucheNachAutor(String autor)
      Searches for books by author.
      Parameters:
      autor - Search text for author
      Returns:
      List of books whose author contains the search text

    • sucheNachGenre

      public List<Buch> sucheNachGenre(String genre)
      Searches for books by genre.
      Parameters:
      genre - Search text for genre
      Returns:
      List of books where any genre matches the search text

    • sucheNachVerlag

      public List<Buch> sucheNachVerlag(String verlag)
      Searches for books by publisher.
      Parameters:
      verlag - Search text for publisher
      Returns:
      List of books whose publisher matches the search text

    • buchDetails

      public Buch buchDetails(String id)
      Returns a single book by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the book
      Returns:
      Book object or null if no book was found with that ID

    • reviewHinzufuegen

      public boolean reviewHinzufuegen(String id, Rezension rez)
      Adds a review to a book.
      Parameters:
      id - Book ID
      rez - Review to be saved
      Returns:
      true if the addition was successful, otherwise false

    • showRezensionen

      public List<Rezension> showRezensionen(String id)
      Returns all reviews for a given book.
      Parameters:
      id - Book ID
      Returns:
      List of matching reviews

    • aehnlich

      public List<Buch> aehnlich(Buch buch)
      Finds similar books based on genre matches. A book is considered similar if it shares at least 3 genres with the given book.
      Parameters:
      buch - The reference book to find similar books for
      Returns:
      List of books that are considered similar (at least 3 matching genres)
